name: Escape the Hyperion
description:
Play as the last remaining survivors attempting to escape a deadly alien infestation on the Hyperion, a futuristic advanced modular colony built on Planet X. You must navigate through the colony to find and modify the coordinates of the Teleport Pad to escape. 

This is a Solo Cooperative board game designed for the 2021 Solo Print and Play Contest on BGG. 

1 player 

45 minutes 

12+

Designed by: Ali 

Artwork: Nicoleta and Threemagiesto 

The game is divided into 3 simple phases. The first phase is the action phase. During this phase, you must do one of the following: 

1- Reveal tiles then move or vice versa 

2- Unlock tiles then move or vice versa

The second phase is the enemy movement phase. Move the stalkers 1 space (orthogonally) towards the nearest player. 

The third phase is the lockdown phase. Discard any locked tiles. 

The game ends when:

A- All the survivors escape together

B- You discard all of the Console tiles without modifying all of the coordinates 

C- You discard all of the Teleport Pad tiles. 

D- You run out of tiles to place. 

Version 0.2: private playtesting complete, artwork and theme applied, mechanics tweaked, tiles reduced from 82 to 70. Also done some artwork and graphic design. 

Regarding the PnP files, more specifically the board, I have split the board into 4 halves. The first page is the top left followed by top right, bottom left, and bottom right. 

The Tiles on the other hand have been organised as Tiles face(4 pages)  then Tiles back (4 pages)
